title: Last plea for low grade louisville old judges
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Last plea for low grade louisville old judges
posts.post_content:
Posted By: William Turner
Hello, I promise this will be the last time I bother the board with my posts for this.  I am looking for any low grade louisville old judge player regardless if it is graded or not.  I am from kentucky and still live here and I would just like to own one of them.  I will probably attend the national in cleveland to try and find one but who knows if they will have one or not.  This will be the last time I will have any spare money for a while so if anyone has won they would be willing to sell please email me.  Thanks for all your help

William

email is: wacturner@hotmail.com
